originalText.text:
I met Dr Safko after I had had a prior experience with another chiropractor. A patient of mine suggested I see Dr Safko because I had not gotten any relief (from the first doctor) I was seeing due to  the back pain I was experiencing.
The initial consultation proved to be more than informative as Dr Safko asked me questions about my daily life that might have contributed to the injury. In a very short time his method proved to be successful and I am grateful on a daily basis for the renewed ability to run and perform daily work related tasks pain free

originalText.text: I traveled to NYC the day I threw out my back.  When I arrived I couldn't stand up straight.  I was in town to race in the NYC triathlon and knew I needed help.  Dr. Safko came very highly recommended by a friend in the city. He agreed to squeeze me in the same day that I called.  He was extremely kind and spent a lot of time with me. I left his office feeling better and woke up the next day able to stand up straight.  I raced 4 days later and had a great race.  I couldn't have done it without Dr. Safko and his staff. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

originalText.text: This Doctor is the best. I was going to have to get surgery on my L5 S1. With Doctor Safko’s team I am able to avoid such a dramatic surgery and getting better each time I see him. He is also a class act. Must see! He will fix you up.

text.text: This Doctor is the best. I was going to have to get surgery on my L5 S1. With Doctor Safko’s team I am able to avoid such a dramatic surgery and getting better each time I see him. He is also a class act. Must see! He will fix you up.

originalText.text: Ronald Safko is a swell guy and a great chiro. I came in here with chronic back pain and he ironed it out over a period of sessions. He is accredited in Active Release and the Graston Techniques. Etti, one of the massage therapists, has healing hands. 5 stars from me.

originalText.text: Dr safco has been my go to dr for the back issues I’ve had over the years  . I always received top of the line care that has kept me pain free . I can’t imagine going anywhere else .
